derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin lotio(n-), from lot- 'washed', from the verb lavare

entry.def: A lotion is a liquid that you use to clean, improve, or protect your skin or hair.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various cosmetic preparations that are applied to the skin
2. liquid preparation having a soothing or antiseptic or medicinal action when applied to the skin;
